structure.endtext: One of the few certainties about projects is that they will involve risk and because of this those risks need to be planned for and managed in a rational and methodical manner. This multi-media training course sets out a basic approach to the problems of identifying, quantifying and managing risk in a project environment. Many of the common techniques of both risk analysis and risk management are covered in a way which is designed to provide practical, down-to-earth guidance on this wide and varied subject.
